title: Versace-Inspired Rose Gold Charm Bracelet with Diamond Accents
features: A delicate rose gold chain featuring evenly spaced round brilliant cut diamond charms. The central charm showcases an enameled Medusa head, enclosed within a diamond halo. The bracelet has secure lobster clasp closure and a adjustable chain length.
description: This bracelet is an ideal fusion of luxury and modern design. The diamond accents add a touch of glamour, while the iconic Medusa head ensures an eye-catching look. The rose gold compliments any skin tone.
